page.title: 08Religion in March
page.content: We have four churches in our area of March;two{Church of England}(St.John's and St.Mary's),one{Methodist}(Station Road),and one{Roman Catholic}(Church of our Lady of Good Counsel). Each church has a reasonable congregation each week. The Rector of{St.Mary's}has two churches to care for,so he cannot do as many services at St.Mary's. He came to tell us how he might spend a weekday.He begins early each morning by going to{church to pray.}Later he has{telephone calls and letters}to deal with.He has his{sermon to prepare for Sunday and he{visits sick people either at home or in hospital.There may also be{services during the week. In the evening he may have{wedding {practices,baptism visits}to make or {confirmation classes}or{committee {meetings}to attend.
